title: vanesadomi
author: vanesadomi
content: What are Blockchain Domains?A blockchain domain is a decentralized, secure and tamper-proof way to store data on a blockchain. Domains are an important part of the blockchain ecosystem, as they provide a way to store data in a decentralized manner. Domains can be used to store data such as website content, application data, user data, and more.what are the advantages of blockchain domains?This new type of website has many benefits over traditional websites. For one, blockchain domains are much more secure. They are also more resistant to censorship, can be used to create decentralized applications and allows you to replace any wallet address with the domainwe offer custom blockchain domains PM for more info!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Why did you hide your offer? why don't you introduce yourself and present your offer precisely?selectively giving information via PM seems like you don't have a clearly defined offer, but you will adapt it to potentially interested customers. I would like to know more about your offer, but I am not willing to discuss it with a newbie which can reply once per few hours due to the limit.good luck with your business.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: I received your pm I always visit this section and have seen your offer and if I'm interested will pm you or reply to your thread it's better to leave your telegram handle or social media account for better communication or if you have a website then leave it in your announcement thread, many are not comfortable receiving offers from newbies.
